lom:description.lom:string: Introductory reference on nanotechnology and society with subtopics: A - Nanohype B - Nanoethics C - Economic Impact D - Nanomedicine E - Nanoagriculture F - Security G - Energy H - Environment I - Transportation J - Manufacturing K - Electronics L - Consumer Products. "Technology has always had a tremendous influence on society. One-hundred years ago people were expected to live to be 47, there were 8000 cars nationally, and pneumoina and influenza were the leading causes of death! The past 100 years have also been filled with great technological advancement. Again, the state of a society is strongly corrolated with its technological knowledge." Caption: Should nanotechnology fulfill all of its promises, it will slowly impact every area of society.
